example.parse: (TOP (S (S (ADVP (ADV رُبَّما)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS رَأَفِت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG حُكُومَة) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (DET+NOUN الفِئْران))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB لٰكِنَّ) (NP-SBJ-1 (PRON_3FS ها)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لَنْ)) (IV3FS+IV تَرأَف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (PRON_1P نا))))))) (CONJ فَ) (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_3FS هِيَّ)) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG مُهِمَة) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (NP-PRD (NOUN تَعذِيب) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))))))
